verses.verse: Maschil of Asaph. Give ear <WH238>, O my people <WH5971>, to my law <WH8451>: Incline <WH5186> your ears <WH241> to the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>.
I will open <WH6605> my mouth <WH6310> in a parable <WH4912>; I will utter <WH5042> dark sayings <WH2420> of old <WH6924>,
Which we have heard <WH8085> and known <WH3045>, And our fathers <WH1> have told us <WH5608>.

We will not hide <WH3582> them from their children <WH1121>, Telling <WH5608> to the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314> the praises <WH8416> of Jehovah <WH3068>, And his strength <WH5807>, and his wondrous works <WH6381> that he hath done <WH6213>.

For he established <WH6965> a testimony <WH5715> in Jacob <WH3290>, And appointed <WH7760> a law <WH8451> in Israel <WH3478>, Which he commanded <WH6680> our fathers <WH1>, That they should make them known <WH3045> to their children <WH1121>;

That the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314> might know <WH3045> them <WH1121>, even the children that should be born <WH3205>; Who should arise <WH6965> and tell <WH5608> them to their children <WH1121>,
That they might set <WH7760> their hope <WH3689> in God <WH430>, And not forget <WH7911> the works <WH4611> of God <WH410>, But keep <WH5341> his commandments <WH4687>,

And might not be as their fathers <WH1>, A stubborn <WH5637> and rebellious <WH4784> generation <WH1755>, A generation <WH1755> that set <WH3559> not their heart <WH3820> aright <WH3559>, And whose spirit <WH7307> was not stedfast <WH539> with God <WH410>.
The children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669>, being armed <WH5401> and carrying <WH7411> bows <WH7198>, Turned back <WH2015> in the day <WH3117> of battle <WH7128>.
They kept <WH8104> not the covenant <WH1285> of God <WH430>, And refused <WH3985> to walk <WH3212> in his law <WH8451>;
And they forgat <WH7911> his doings <WH5949>, And his wondrous works <WH5949> that he had showed them <WH7200>.
Marvellous things <WH6382> did <WH6213> he in the sight <WH5048> of their fathers <WH1>, In the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the field <WH7704> of Zoan <WH6814>.
He clave <WH1234> the sea <WH3220>, and caused them to pass through <WH5674>; And he made the waters <WH4325> to stand <WH5324> as a heap <WH5067>.
In the day-time <WH3119> also he led <WH5148> them with a cloud <WH6051>, And all the night <WH3915> with a light <WH216> of fire <WH784>.
He clave <WH1234> rocks <WH6697> in the wilderness <WH4057>, And gave them drink <WH8248> abundantly as out of the <WH7227> depths <WH8415>.
He brought <WH3318> streams <WH5140> also out of the rock <WH5553>, And caused waters <WH4325> to run down <WH3381> like rivers <WH5104>.
Yet went they on still <WH3254> to sin <WH2398> against him <WH4784>, To rebel against the Most High <WH5945> in the desert <WH6723>.
And they tempted <WH5254> God <WH410> in their heart <WH3824> By asking <WH7592> food <WH400> according to their desire <WH5315>.
Yea <WH1696>, they spake against God <WH430>; They said <WH559>, Can <WH3201> God <WH410> prepare <WH6186> a table <WH7979> in the wilderness <WH4057>?

Behold <WH5221>, he smote the rock <WH6697>, so that waters <WH4325> gushed out <WH2100>, And streams <WH5158> overflowed <WH7857>; Can <WH3201> he give <WH5414> bread <WH3899> also <WH3201>? Will he provide <WH3559> flesh <WH7607> for his people <WH5971>?
Therefore Jehovah <WH3068> heard <WH8085>, and was wroth <WH5674>; And a fire <WH784> was kindled <WH5400> against Jacob <WH3290>, And anger <WH639> also went up <WH5927> against Israel <WH3478>;
Because they believed <WH539> not in God <WH430>, And trusted <WH982> not in his salvation <WH3444>.
Yet he commanded <WH6680> the skies <WH7834> above <WH4605>, And opened <WH6605> the doors <WH1817> of heaven <WH8064>;
And he rained down <WH4305> manna <WH4478> upon them to eat <WH398>, And gave <WH5414> them food <WH1715> from heaven <WH8064>.
Man <WH376> did eat <WH398> the bread <WH3899> of the mighty <WH47>: He sent <WH7971> them food <WH6720> to the full <WH7648>.
He caused the east wind <WH6921> to blow <WH5265> in the heavens <WH8064>; And by his power <WH5797> he guided <WH5090> the south wind <WH8486>.
He rained <WH4305> flesh <WH7607> also upon them as the dust <WH6083>, And winged <WH3671> birds <WH5775> as the sand <WH2344> of the seas <WH3220>:
And he let it fall <WH5307> in the midst <WH7130> of their camp <WH4264>, Round about <WH5439> their habitations <WH4908>.
So they did eat <WH398>, and were well <WH3966> filled <WH7646>; And he gave <WH935> them their own desire <WH8378>.
They were not estranged <WH2114> from that which they desired <WH8378>, Their food <WH400> was yet in their mouths <WH6310>,
When the anger <WH639> of God <WH430> went <WH5927> up against them <WH2026>, And slew of the fattest <WH4924> of them <WH3766>, And smote down the young <WH970> men of Israel <WH3478>.
For all this they sinned <WH2398> still <WH539>, And believed not in his wondrous works <WH6381>.
Therefore their days <WH3117> did he consume <WH3615> in vanity <WH1892>, And their years <WH8141> in terror <WH928>.
When he slew <WH2026> them <WH1875>, then they inquired after him <WH7725>; And they returned and sought God <WH410> earnestly <WH7836>.
And they remembered <WH2142> that God <WH430> was their rock <WH6697>, And the Most High <WH5945> God <WH410> their redeemer <WH1350>.
But they flattered <WH6601> him with their mouth <WH6310>, And lied <WH3576> unto him with their tongue <WH3956>.
For their heart <WH3820> was not right <WH3559> with him <WH539>, Neither were they faithful in his covenant <WH1285>.

But he <WH7349>, being merciful, forgave <WH3722> their iniquity <WH5771>, and destroyed <WH7843> them not <WH7235>: Yea, many a time turned <WH7725> he his anger <WH639> away <WH7725>, And did not stir up <WH5782> all his wrath <WH2534>.
And he remembered <WH2142> that they were but flesh <WH1320>, A wind <WH7307> that passeth away <WH1980>, and cometh not again <WH7725>.
How <WH4100> oft did they rebel <WH4784> against him in the wilderness <WH4057>, And grieve <WH6087> him in the desert <WH3452>!
And they turned <WH7725> again and tempted <WH5254> God <WH410>, And provoked <WH8428> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>.
They remember <WH2142> not his hand <WH3027>, Nor the day <WH3117> when he redeemed <WH6299> them from the adversary <WH6862>;
How he set <WH7760> his signs <WH226> in Egypt <WH4714>, And his wonders <WH226> in the field <WH7704> of Zoan <WH6814>,
And turned <WH2015> their rivers <WH2975> into blood <WH1818>, And their streams <WH2975>, so that they could not drink <WH8354>.
He sent <WH7971> among them swarms of flies <WH6157>, which devoured <WH398> them <WH6854>; And frogs, which destroyed them <WH7843>.
He gave <WH5414> also their increase <WH2981> unto the caterpillar <WH2625>, And their labor <WH3018> unto the locust <WH697>.
He destroyed <WH2026> their vines <WH1612> with hail <WH1259>, And their sycomore-trees <WH8256> with frost <WH2602>.
He gave over <WH5462> their cattle <WH1165> also to the hail <WH1259>, And their flocks <WH4735> to hot thunderbolts <WH7565>.
He cast <WH7971> upon them the fierceness <WH2740> of his anger <WH639>, Wrath <WH5678>, and indignation <WH2195>, and trouble <WH6869>, A band <WH4917> of angels <WH4397> of evil <WH7451>.
He made <WH6424> a path <WH5410> for his anger <WH639>; He spared <WH2820> not their soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>, But gave <WH5462> their life <WH2416> over <WH5462> to the pestilence <WH1698>,
And smote <WH5221> all the first-born <WH1060> in Egypt <WH4714>, The chief <WH7225> of their strength <WH202> in the tents <WH168> of Ham <WH2526>.
But he led forth <WH5265> his own people <WH5971> like sheep <WH6629>, And guided <WH5090> them in the wilderness <WH4057> like a flock <WH5739>.
And he led <WH5148> them safely <WH983>, so that they feared <WH6342> not <WH3220>; But the sea overwhelmed <WH3680> their enemies <WH341>.
And he brought <WH935> them to the border <WH1366> of his sanctuary <WH6944>, To this mountain <WH2022>, which his right hand <WH3225> had gotten <WH7069>.

He drove out <WH1644> the nations <WH1471> also before <WH6440> them <WH5307>, And allotted them for an inheritance <WH5159> by line <WH2256>, And made the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to dwell <WH7931> in their tents <WH168>.
Yet they tempted <WH5254> and rebelled <WH4784> against the Most High <WH5945> God <WH430>, And kept <WH8104> not his testimonies <WH5713>;
But turned back <WH5472>, and dealt treacherously <WH898> like their fathers <WH1>: They were turned aside <WH2015> like a deceitful <WH7423> bow <WH7198>.
For they provoked him to anger <WH3707> with their high places <WH1116>, And moved him to jealousy <WH7065> with their graven images <WH6456>.
When God <WH430> heard <WH8085> this <WH5674>, he was wroth, And greatly <WH3966> abhorred <WH3988> Israel <WH3478>;
So that he forsook <WH5203> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Shiloh <WH7887>, The tent <WH168> which he placed <WH7931> among men <WH120>;
And delivered <WH5414> his strength <WH5797> into captivity <WH7628>, And his glory <WH8597> into the adversary <WH6862>'s hand <WH3027>.
He gave <WH5462> his people <WH5971> over <WH5462> also unto the sword <WH2719>, And was wroth <WH5674> with his inheritance <WH5159>.
Fire <WH784> devoured <WH398> their young men <WH970>; And their virgins <WH1330> had no marriage-song <WH1984>.
Their priests <WH3548> fell <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>; And their widows <WH490> made no lamentation <WH1058>.
Then the Lord <WH136> awaked <WH3364> as one out of sleep <WH3463>, Like a mighty man <WH1368> that shouteth <WH7442> by reason of wine <WH3196>.
And he smote <WH5221> his adversaries <WH6862> backward <WH268>: He put <WH5414> them to a perpetual <WH5769> reproach <WH2781>.
Moreover he refused <WH3988> the tent <WH168> of Joseph <WH3130>, And chose <WH977> not the tribe <WH7626> of Ephraim <WH669>,
But chose <WH977> the tribe <WH7626> of Judah <WH3063>, The mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> which he loved <WH157>.
And he built <WH1129> his sanctuary <WH4720> like the heights <WH7311>, Like the earth <WH776> which he hath established <WH3245> for ever <WH5769>.
He chose <WH977> David <WH1732> also his servant <WH5650>, And took <WH3947> him from the sheepfolds <WH4356>:
From following <WH310> the ewes that have their young <WH5763> he brought <WH935> him <WH7462>, To be the shepherd of Jacob <WH3290> his people <WH5971>, and Israel <WH3478> his inheritance <WH5159>.
So he was their shepherd <WH7462> according to the integrity <WH8537> of his heart <WH3824>, And guided <WH5148> them by the skilfulness <WH8394> of his hands <WH3709>.
